translation.en: I saw them shoot him, in the dream.
translation.es: En el sueño, vi que le disparaban.

translation.en: Because that is what's written in God's book -
translation.es: Porque estaba escrito en el Corán.

translation.en: Say, "Nothing shall befall us, except what God has ordained."
translation.es: Repite: "Nada es coincidencia, todo es parte del plan de Dios".

translation.en: He took him sooner than we wanted.
translation.es: ...que se lo llevó antes de lo que nos hubiese gustado.

translation.en: Does God love me that much?
but God has a different plan for you.
translation.es: ...pero tiene un plan diferente para ti.

translation.en: [mother] He will reveal it to you when you're ready.
translation.es: Te lo revelará cuando estés listo.

translation.en: [woman, in English] US foreign policy has come under criticism once again
translation.es: La política internacional de los EE. UU. fue criticada una vez más

translation.en: with the resurgence of ISIL in Syria.
translation.es: por la reaparición del ISIS en Siria.

translation.en: Since allied forces left the region in 2019,
translation.es: Desde que las fuerzas aliadas dejaron la zona en 2019,

translation.en: several cities have fallen to the caliphate in swift succession
translation.es: muchas ciudades cayeron en el califato, que se expande rápidamente hacia el sur.
que se expande rápidamente hacia el sur.

translation.en: The city of Damascus has been under siege for months now,
translation.es: Damasco ha estado asediada durante meses y la crisis de los refugiados ha empeorado.
y la crisis de los refugiados ha empeorado.

translation.en: It seems nothing but an act of God
translation.es: Parece que solo un acto de Dios

translation.en: can stop the ancient city from falling to the caliphate.
translation.es: evitará que la ciudad vieja caiga en el califato.

translation.en: [man yelling in Arabic] Today, God gives us Damascus!
[man, in Arabic] Jibril? When did you escape?
They said you joined the rebels.
translation.es: Dicen que te uniste a los rebeldes.

translation.en: Your family was worried about you.
Listen to me, my brothers and sisters.
They pretend to preach God's word,
translation.es: Ellos dicen que predican la palabra de Dios,

translation.en: and all they do is twist its meaning.
It is written in The Book.
"They shall be held up to shame in this world...
translation.es: "Serán condenados a penar en este mundo...

translation.en: they have incurred God's most inexorable wrath...
translation.es: ...han provocado la imparable furia de Dios...

translation.en: [in Farsi] May the Devil swallow you up!
I've looked the Devil in the eye.
translation.es: He mirado al diablo a los ojos.

translation.en: [in Arabic] It is written - Say, "Nothing shall befall us,
translation.es: Está escrito. "Nada es coincidencia, todo es parte del plan de Dios".
"Nada es coincidencia, todo es parte del plan de Dios".

translation.en: Say, "Nothing shall befall us, except what God has ordained."
translation.es: Repitan: "Nada es coincidencia, todo es parte del plan de Dios".

translation.en: [man] It is forbidden to misquote the scriptures!
You've suffered more than anyone on this earth.
translation.es: Han sufrido más que nadie en esta tierra.

translation.en: You're surrounded by enemies who want to eradicate you.
translation.es: Están rodeados de enemigos que quieren eliminarlos.

translation.en: Believe me when I say God will defeat your enemies!
translation.es: ¡Créanme cuando les digo que Dios derrotará al enemigo! Porque Dios quiere que vivan.

translation.en: Because God wants you to live.
Mark my words! On this day, mark my words!
translation.es: ¡Recuerden el mensaje que les traigo hoy!

translation.en: God's hand will turn them away!
There is nothing to be afraid of!

translation.es: Es el último aliento del enemigo.
Con una duración récord de 43 días,

translation.en: a sandstorm of biblical proportions, covering the city of Damascus in a blanket of dust.
translation.es: la tormenta de arena de magnitud bíblica cubrió la ciudad de Damasco con polvo.
Se desconoce el alcance de los daños.

translation.en: Roads and motorways have been rendered inoperable,
the city's international airport closed for weeks,
translation.es: y el aeropuerto lleva semanas cerrado, lo que dejó a la ciudad desconectada
lo que dejó a la ciudad desconectada

translation.en: causing hundreds of businesses to shut down.
translation.es: y obligó a muchísimos negocios a cerrar.

translation.en: there were celebrations across Damascus today,
as ISIS militia finally withdrew troops from their long-held position outside the ancient city,
translation.es: cuando el ISIS retiró las tropas de las afueras de la ciudad vieja,

translation.en: after the month-long sandstorm literally buried their ground forces,
translation.es: después de que las fuerzas de infantería quedaran bajo tierra

translation.en: cutting off the chain of supply.
translation.es: y se cortara la cadena de suministro.

translation.en: the end of ISIS as a threat in the Middle East.
translation.es: el fin de ISIS como amenaza en Medio Oriente.

translation.en: This was ISIL's last stronghold in Syria after the resurgence of 2019,
translation.es: Fue el último bastión del ISIS en Siria después del resurgimiento en 2019,

translation.en: and this finally spells their end.
So, yes, we're very grateful for the weather.
translation.es: Vino bien el clima, después de todo.

translation.en: [Keneally] The president said he was hopeful this development would open up...
translation.es: El presidente espera que esta situación libere...

translation.en: All right, you can sit up -and get dressed now, Ms. Geller. -[sighs]
translation.es: Muy bien. Ya puede vestirse, señora Geller.

translation.en: Has the doctor gone over everything with you?
You'll probably feel funny for the first few days--
I know. This isn't my first time.
translation.es: Lo sé. No es mi primera vez.

translation.en: -[Ms. Geller] You're a philosophy major. -[man] Yes, ma'am.
[Ms. Geller] So, why do you wanna work for the CIA?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué quieres trabajar para la CIA?

translation.en: I think it's one of the most important jobs a person can have.
Keeping our country safe. Upholding its values.
translation.es: mantener el país a salvo y defender sus valores.

translation.en: What's a misconception that some people may have about you?
translation.es: ¿Qué idea equivocada pueden tener otros sobre ti?

translation.en: I accept all different kinds of people.
translation.es: Acepto a todo tipo de personas.

translation.en: If he'd served his time and was remorseful.
translation.es: Si cumplió su condena y si estuviera arrepentido.

translation.en: What wouldn't you trust him with?
Would you trust him to tell you the truth?
translation.es: ¿Confiarías en que te dice la verdad?

translation.en: Well, the truth has many different versions.
translation.es: La verdad tiene muchas versiones diferentes.

translation.en: The truth has many different versions?

translation.es: No todo es blanco o negro.

translation.en: I'm gonna stop the interview there.
I know I shouldn't be telling you this, but I won't be recommending you.
translation.es: Sé que no debería decírtelo, pero no te recomendaré.

translation.en: The CIA is like a holy order.
translation.es: La CIA es como una orden sagrada.

translation.en: It's a doctrine that you live by.
translation.es: Es una doctrina que rige tu vida.

translation.en: People's lives depend on the decisions that we make,
translation.es: Muchas vidas dependen de nuestras decisiones,

translation.en: When you're in the trenches, you need to know who your enemies are.
translation.es: En una situación crítica, debes conocer al enemigo.

translation.en: The truth may look gray, but I assure you it is not.
translation.es: Te aseguro que hay verdades absolutas.
Q: AÚN NO SABEMOS SU NOMBRE.

translation.en: Where do you lead us, Imam?
Dad, what part of "I'm working" don't you understand?
translation.es: Papá, ¿qué parte de "estoy trabajando" no entiendes?

translation.en: Well, I was just wondering how it went today at the clinic.
translation.es: Quería saber cómo te fue hoy en la clínica.

translation.en: [sighs] Fine. Just... just like last time.

translation.es: No te lo tomas en serio.

translation.en: Of course I'm taking it seriously.
translation.es: Claro que me lo tomo en serio.
Q: ENCONTRÉ UNA. - Debo colgar. - Bueno.

translation.en: I listened to those other files. I'm hearing, uh, some other accent.
translation.es: Escuché los demás archivos. Percibo otro acento.

translation.en: Iranian, maybe, which likely means he's Shi'ite.
translation.es: Iraní, tal vez, lo que significaría que es chiita.

translation.en: He just led 2,000 Syrian Palestinians into the desert.
translation.es: Llevó a 2000 palestinos sirios al desierto.

translation.en: What's a Shi'ite doing leading a bunch of Sunnis?
translation.es: ¿Un chiita como líder de un grupo de suníes?

translation.en: I'll put him on our watch list and get eyes on him in the morning.
translation.es: Lo pondré en la lista de vigilancia mañana temprano.

translation.en: [in Arabic] "If you look for truth, you may find comfort.
translation.es: "Si buscas la verdad, es posible que encuentres consuelo.

translation.en: If you look for comfort, you will never find truth."
translation.es: Si buscas consuelo, nunca encontrarás la verdad".

translation.en: [man] Why do you quote an infidel?
Who are you to judge who's an infidel?
translation.es: ¿Quién eres tú para juzgar a alguien de infiel?
- Todos tienen hambre, Imam. - No interrumpas.

translation.en: Why do you call me Imam?
But you turned away evil as you said you would.
translation.es: Pero, como dijiste, lograste alejar al enemigo.
Pero Él obra a través de ti.

translation.en: "Did He create you in jest? Without purpose?"
translation.es: "¿Acaso Él te creó sin un propósito?".

translation.en: You expect a shoemaker's son to know the scriptures?
translation.es: Es el hijo de un zapatero. No conoce las Escrituras.
Entonces, Él obra a través de ti.
Él obra a través de todos.

translation.en: You mean He works through all who righteously follow Islam.
translation.es: Es decir, obra a través de aquellos que siguen los principios del islam.

translation.en: Don't tell me what I mean.
translation.es: No pongas palabras en mi boca.

translation.en: Why are there no women here?
Go find a woman... and give her your seat.
translation.es: Ve a buscar una mujer y dale tu asiento.

translation.en: He has led us into the desert with no food.
translation.es: Nos trajo al desierto sin comida.

translation.en: And to leave me now is to perish.
translation.es: Y si dejan de seguirme, será su fin.

translation.en: I'm here to tell you to throw away your assumptions about God.
translation.es: Vine a decirles que dejen a un lado lo que saben sobre Dios.

translation.en: Stop clinging to what you think you know.
translation.es: Dejen de aferrarse a lo que creen saber.

translation.en: In this hour, mankind is a rudderless boat.
translation.es: En este momento, la humanidad es un barco sin timón.

translation.en: Am I stopping you from getting home?
translation.es: ¿No puedes ir a casa por mi culpa?

translation.en: It's my job. Gotta be here anyway.
translation.es: Debo cumplir con mi horario de todos modos.

translation.en: The only thing you have to remember is that he was right.
Huntington predicted that the primary axis of world conflict after the Cold War
translation.es: Huntington predijo que las causas de un conflicto mundial tras la Guerra Fría serían culturales y religiosas.

translation.en: would be along cultural and religious lines.
translation.es: tras la Guerra Fría serían culturales y religiosas.

translation.en: It's exactly what's happening in world politics today,
translation.es: Es exactamente lo que está pasando en la política,

translation.en: so just... center your paper around that argument.
translation.es: así que usa ese argumento en tu ensayo.

translation.en: My boss calls you Ms. Night Owl.
translation.es: Mi jefe te llama la Noctámbula.

translation.en: Wait, so, what do you do...
That's what my uncle used to say.
-You a field agent? -I never said I worked for the CIA.
translation.es: - ¿Agente de campo? - No dije nada de la CIA.

translation.en: He was doing what... what he loved.
[Samer, in Arabic] What is he doing?
He stood for 30 days on the Gate of St. Thomas
translation.es: Pasó 30 días en la Puerta de Santo Tomás

translation.en: and preached without food or water, during a sandstorm,
translation.es: predicando, sin comida ni agua, durante la tormenta de arena

translation.en: while we hid in a building, fearing for our lives.
translation.es: predicando, sin comida ni agua, durante la tormenta de arena mientras buscábamos refugio y temíamos por nuestras vidas.

translation.en: You don't believe he really did that, do you?

translation.es: Él es la reencarnación de Jesús.

translation.en: Do you know there is a star for every soul?
translation.es: ¿Sabes que cada alma tiene una estrella?

translation.en: Imam... is my mother in a good place?
translation.es: Imam, ¿mi madre está en un lugar mejor?

translation.en: He would forsake a soul as good as hers?
translation.es: ...abandonaría a un alma tan buena como la de ella?

translation.en: It's good you're thinking about the next life.
translation.es: Es bueno que pienses en la próxima vida.

translation.en: It's pointless to question these things.
in this moment because I have always been here in this moment...
translation.es: ...porque siempre he estado aquí, en este instante...

translation.en: You have light in you, Jibril...
translation.es: Tienes luz dentro de ti, Jibril.

translation.en: but God is going to ask some hard things of you.
translation.es: Pero Dios te pedirá que hagas cosas difíciles.

translation.en: Pack up the camp. We're moving.
Possibly. ISIL use this type of apocalyptic propaganda all the time,
translation.es: Quizá. El ISIS suele usar propaganda apocalíptica

translation.en: This guy's just taken it to the next level.
translation.es: Este hombre fue más allá de eso.

translation.en: So, he's some rival faction? Al-Qaeda?
-We don't know who he's associated with. -What do we know about him?
translation.es: No sé con quién está asociado. - ¿Qué sabemos? - Eso es lo preocupante.

translation.en: He's come out of nowhere and he's leading desperate people into the desert.
translation.es: Salió de la nada y lleva gente desesperada al desierto.

translation.en: Well, if it's a cult, he could be leading them to their death.
translation.es: Si es un culto, es posible que los mate a todos...

translation.en: Or he could be creating an army.
An army of sick and starving refugees?
He's creating a cause, in the hope that other people will join him.
translation.es: Creó una causa con la esperanza de obtener seguidores.

translation.en: -That's a lot of speculation, Eva. -It's my job to speculate, ma'am.
translation.es: - Es mucha especulación, Eva. - Ese es mi trabajo, señora.

translation.en: What if he turns out to be another al-Baghdadi?
translation.es: ¿Y si resulta ser otro Al Baghdadi?

translation.en: I'd like to keep an eye on him.
What do you have over Syria?
We'll lose range in about four minutes. What are we looking for, exactly?
translation.es: Se desconectará en unos minutos. ¿Qué buscamos?

translation.en: Can you zoom in on that?
He's led us to our deaths.
We need to get a message to that security post in Israel.
translation.es: Debemos comunicarnos con ese puesto de seguridad.

translation.en: Imam, what do you want us to do?
Dig a hole and bury them.
translation.es: Caven un pozo y entierren todo.
Tenemos a un loco de mierda.

translation.en: [in English] Oh, shit. Oh, shit, shit, shit, shit.
[in Arabic] Be strong. God is with you.
-[on radio] Hold fire! -Where the hell is reinforcement?
Lay down on the ground. I said lay down!
[woman, in English] A dramatic arrest took place at the Israeli border...
translation.es: Arrestaron a un hombre en la frontera israelí esta mañana.
Arrestaron a un hombre en la frontera israelí esta mañana. Una patrulla armada encontró a 2000 refugiados...

translation.en: the Palestinian refugees entry back into their homeland,
translation.es: Una patrulla armada encontró a 2000 refugiados...

translation.en: led by a man they call al-Masih. -[English] ...crowd was fired at... -...man from Lebanon...
translation.es: - Aparentemente, la multitud salió... - ...iban hacia Israel.

translation.en: -...Israelis to the Syrian border... -...so far refused the refugees passage,
translation.es: El gobierno israelí envió refuerzos a la frontera con Siria

translation.en: -criticised by Muslims worldwide... -...a caravan of asylum seekers...
translation.es: y recibió críticas de comunidades musulmanas de todo el mundo.

translation.en: [in English] As displaced Palestinians, they claim they are entitled passage
translation.es: Afirman que tienen derecho a ingresar a Cisjordania

translation.en: into the West Bank as rightful citizens.
And someone fix my hair. I look like Phil Spector.
translation.es: Y arréglenme el cabello. Parezco Phil Spector.

translation.en: -[woman, in Hebrew] What are you doing? -What's it look like?
You can't just let yourself in.
Let me look at you! I'm all sweaty.
You're supposed to call and let me know you're coming.
translation.es: Debes llamarme y decirme que vas a venir.

translation.en: [in English] Great way to talk around your daughter.
translation.es: No hables así frente a tu hija.

translation.en: Oh, like she never heard that from you?
translation.es: Como si tú nunca hablaras así.

translation.en: -Where are you going? -I need to take a shower.
[in English] Did you just come here to judge me?
When are you going to move your shit out?
...arrested this morning, when attempting to cross the border.
translation.es: ¿Cuándo te llevarás tus cosas? Lo arrestaron esta mañana cuando intentó cruzar la frontera.
Lo arrestaron esta mañana cuando intentó cruzar la frontera.

translation.en: [in Hebrew] Oh, so you bothered this week?
[in Hebrew] Have you got a job yet?
[in English] My job is to look after our daughter. You should try it sometime.
translation.es: Debo cuidar a nuestra hija. Soy la única que lo hace.

translation.en: [in English] Are you going to break her heart again?
We'll eventually pull something on him, but it's gonna take time and resources.
translation.es: Encontraremos información, pero esto demanda tiempo y recursos.

translation.en: The fastest way to get to know him is to meet him.
translation.es: La mejor forma de conocerlo es verlo en persona.

translation.en: He's not our detainee, so, for the moment, he's not our concern.
translation.es: No lo arrestamos nosotros. No es asunto nuestro.

translation.en: [Eva] I wouldn't underestimate this guy, sir.
This wasn't just aimed at Israel.
translation.es: No solo se dirige a Israel.

translation.en: He knows that America has to defend Israel's position,
translation.es: Sabe que EE. UU. debe defender la postura israelí,

translation.en: and as long as those starving people sit at their border,
translation.es: y mientras haya gente con hambre en la frontera,

translation.en: the more indefensible that position becomes.
We'll get dragged into something we don't want.
Why don't you let the politicians worry about that?
translation.es: Deja que los políticos se preocupen por eso.

translation.en: My God, you're like your father.
[in English] This is my day off.
I don't want you to waste my time, so it would be best if you just answer my questions.
translation.es: No me hagas perder el tiempo, solo responde mis preguntas.

translation.en: [in English] To see the Holy Land.
-So, I'm free to leave? -I ask the questions here.
[in English] Do you even know what that means?
Okay, Mr. The Word, I don't care if you sit here and rot,
translation.es: Señor Palabra, no me importa si te pudres en una celda.

translation.en: I just don't want you to waste my fucking time.
translation.es: No me hagas perder el tiempo, carajo.

translation.en: So, where did you learn all your Hebrew?
From where? Ramat Gan? Jerusalem? Where?
-Why, you assume I'm Palestinian? -Oh, you're not?
Why don't you take God and stick him up your fucking ass?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te metes a tu dios en el culo?

translation.en: What were you doing in Syria?

translation.es: - ¿Un mensaje de quién? - De mi padre.

translation.en: [in Hebrew] That will be revealed in time.
translation.es: Será revelado en su debido momento.

translation.en: Why not save me the fucking suspense and just admit it now?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si me ahorras el puto suspenso?

translation.en: [in Hebrew] No one needed to tell me your name.
You are in my father's book.
translation.es: Estás en el libro de mi padre.
Tu ira está fuera de lugar.

translation.en: You don't want to know about my anger.
[in Hebrew] You hold onto hatred like it's a prize,
translation.es: Te aferras al odio como si fuera un premio,

translation.en: when it's the weight around your neck.
translation.es: pero es algo que te esclaviza.

translation.en: [in English] You want to hurt me...
You talk a lot of shit.
You hurt a lot of people.
It's part of my job, yes.
translation.es: Es parte de mi trabajo, sí.

translation.en: I take pride in my work.
Is that when you stopped believing?
[in Hebrew] He is waiting for you, Aviram...
[in Hebrew] Put him in the hole.
[in Hebrew] Why would I do that?
He did something stupid, I'm not going to take pity on him.
translation.es: Hizo algo estúpido. No me voy a apiadar de él.

translation.en: The country's crumbling and he decides to rob a fucking store.
translation.es: El país se desmorona y él decide robar una maldita tienda.
Estás más enfadado que de costumbre.

translation.en: You've never mentioned Megiddo to anyone?
translation.es: ¿Le contaste a alguien lo de Megido?

translation.en: Why are you even talking about it?
[Aviram, in English] You know how many times I've sat opposite that hood?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuántas veces me senté frente a un encapuchado?

translation.en: And every time, it was me.
We could go on doing this forever, you know?
I'm the one asking the questions.
